about_the_game:
"Zombi Efem" takes you to the heights of fear and excitement in a unique survival game. You can fight against zombies in either third-person shooter (TPS) or first-person shooter (FPS) mode. Whether you play solo or online with up to four players, strive to survive in this action-packed world.

The game is set in a dark and dangerous world, filled with zombie hordes waiting around every corner to test your survival skills. Plan your strategy well, choose your weapons and equipment carefully, and most importantly, stick together! With advanced graphics and realistic sound effects, once you step into this world, you'll find yourself in a true zombie apocalypse scenario.

"Zombi Efem" is not just a game, but also an experience where you and your friends fight for a common goal, emphasizing strategy and teamwork. As you struggle to survive, stay alert and prepare for your enemies in the best way possible. How long can you endure this tough battle against zombies?

content_descriptors.notes: If you shoot at the zombies you have fought in the game, you may see blood and severed body parts. If you are affected by such blood and violent content, you need to be careful.

name: Zombi Efem

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core I5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 4060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Join the battle for survival against zombies with "Zombi Efem"! Play solo or online with up to four players in both TPS and FPS modes. This horror survival game invites you to face challenging combats and thrilling moments. Plan your strategy, prepare your weapons, and fight to survive!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Norwegian*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
